diagnosis: Diagnosis of breast cancer (M = Malignant, B = Benign).
radius_mean: Mean of distances from center to points on the perimeter.
perimeter_mean: Mean size of the perimeter of the tumor.
area_mean: Mean size of the area of the tumor.
smoothness_mean: Mean value for local variation in radius lengths.
concavity_mean: Mean severity of concave portions of the tumor contour.
concave points_mean: Mean number of concave portions of the contour.
radius_se: Standard error for the radius measurement.
texture_se: Standard error for the texture measurement.
perimeter_se: Standard error for the perimeter measurement.
area_se: Standard error for the area measurement.
